author: DJimBo
title: What a foult...
review:
Lego began the Galidor theme with great faith, but it all was one big mistake!
This game was just the most weird and boring game i've ever played.

Pros:
- there are some special abilities in the game.

Cons:
- there is a very short time period to use the special abilities.
- I couldn't finish level 1 because the special ability time period was over before I could do the things i had to do...

overall just a very stupid game and a real big mistake...
DON'T BUY IT!

author: terfsten
title: Horrible game
review:
A Horrible Game
                This is a horrible game. I didn't even think these were Legos. This is by far the worst Lego Theme ever. I got this game as a 4-game super pack. I couldn't get past the first level. The instructions that your "helper" gave you were confusing and I could not follow them. No matter what I did my character was hard to control. If I did understand the directions it was really hard to carry them out. The graphics of the game, however, are pretty good.

            Summary
               Overall, I suggest you don't buy this game. Its cons outweigh its pros and it doesn't even look like Legos.
